divs: sighting detailsaround 5pm to 6pm on 8\27\2011, i was going to store with 3 other people in the car, i was driving up a hill, when i spotted a black thing in the sky, told the others in the car, as we tried to figure out what it was. thought it was a hang glider, the other person in the car thought it was a kit, then said it was a motorized airplane. our windows where down, as it got closer you could not here any noise coming from the aircraft and you could see that it was not what we thought. it was flying very low towards us and took a turn towards the mountains it was all black and the shape was a triangle. i know others seen this, since i could see the driver in front of me pointing at it. upset that i could not find my phone in time to get a picture. (just trying to figure out what this was?)did not see or hear anything in the news. i do know that since we live in the area, that our cable, phone and internet was out for several hours.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Westminster
There were no other sightings in Westminster on or around August 27th 2011
Summary: flying aircraft seen in daytime on 8/27/2011around 5pm, in westminster colorado
